mapper.update: update broker_history set broker_code = #{brokerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_type = #{opType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, broker_code, op_type, comment, create_time, create_user_id from broker_history
